description: This Java source file defines a class named 'Version' that reads build version information from a properties file embedded within a jar. It provides methods to access version number, revision, build date, and comparison functionalities.

classes.name: Version
classes.description: A utility class to load and represent build version information from a properties file, with capabilities for comparison and formatting.

methods.name: Version
methods.description: Constructs a Version object by reading version info from a resource file within the classpath.

methods.name: Version
methods.description: Constructs a Version object by reading version info from a given URL pointing to a properties file.

methods.name: Version
methods.description: Constructs a Version object with explicit version, revision, and build number.

methods.name: getFloatString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of version and revision, e.g., '1.3.4'.

methods.name: getVersionString
methods.description: Returns a string detailing version, revision and build number.

methods.name: getBuildDateString
methods.description: Returns the build date as a formatted string.

methods.name: compareTo
methods.description: Compares this version to another version object for ordering.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a human-readable string describing the version.

methods.name: readInt
methods.description: Helper method to parse integer properties.

methods.name: readDate
methods.description: Helper method to parse date properties from string.
